Directions

About Us

First Baptist Church Muncie has a rich history, but is also a forward looking, ministry-oriented congregation.
First Baptist is located at 309 E. Adams Street, Muncie, IN 47396, Phone: 765-284-7749

Flickr

    Publications

    Read recent publications from First Baptist Church. A weekly bulletin and a monthly newsletter may give you insight into how we live out our calling in this city.
